#summary &aacute character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesA

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesA A] > &aacute

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Aacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00c1/index.htm U+000C1].
  * `&Aacute` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00c1/index.htm U+000C1].
  * `&aacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00e1/index.htm U+000E1].
  * `&aacute` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00e1/index.htm U+000E1].
